summary: I was annoyed by the lights in Fort Dawnguard, esspecially in the smithing area. So I changed them a bit to my liking.
descriptionHtml:
This mods adds lights with shadows to the Fort Dawnguard smithing area to give the place a more appealing look. For now that is the only changes I made to the fort. I might replace more lights later on and update this mod.

I\'m using [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15105]Sharpsooters ENB[/url], a modified version of it anyway. Not sure the lights looks any good without ENB or some of the other lighting mods.

Rerquirements:
Skyrim v1.8
Dawnguard DLC

Installation:
Download the file with NMM and install or download manually and place the XN_Fort Dawnguard Lights.esp into Skyrim/Data folder and activate in your launcher.

Uninstall:
Uninstall with NMM or delete the XN_Fort Dawnguard Lights.esp

Compatiblities:
Compatible with anything that doesn\'t change Fort Doawnguard. Incompatible with anything that does.
author: Xavier Noir
